name: Ice ring for punch bowl
ingredients: Water and small amount of your fruit punch
instructions: In a 6-6 1/2 ring mold arrange citrus slices (lemon and lime looks nice alternating).
Can also put cherries or strawberries in.
Slowly pour water into mold to partially cover fruit.
When frozen add water to fill mold 3/4 full, freeze.
When ready, unmold and float fruit side up in punch bowl.
If you donâ€™t want your punch to dilute, freeze ring with part of the punch you are using.
